si.title: මව murder ාතනය කිරීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් නියාම හමුදාව අත්අඩංගුවට ගනු ලැබීය
body_lines: මොණරගල නක්කලා හි නිවසක පිහියක පිහියකින් පුතෙකු ලැබුණු විට මව - මව was ාතනය කරන ලදී.. මොණරගල පොලිසිය පැවසුවේ බිරිඳ ද තුවාල ලබා ඇති බවයි.
පවුල් ආරවුලක් හේතුවෙන් ඇති වූ ආරවුලක පිහි කෝප්පයක් සිදු වූ බව පොලිසිය පවසයි.

en.title: Nephew arrested for murdering mother -in -law
body_lines: The mother -in -law was killed when a son -in -law was hit by a knife in a house in Nakkala, Moneragala. Moneragala police said the wife was also injured.
Pushpa Kumari (44 years old) from Nakkala has died.
Police said that the knife incident took place in a dispute caused by a family dispute.

summary_lines: A nephew was arrested for murdering his mother-in-law in Nakkala, Moneragala, during a family dispute. The mother-in-law, Pushpa Kumari, 44, was killed, and her wife was injured.
